lines.text:
[To Stan]
I wish I'd checked you with the baggage.
Well, we've lost the music. Now, what are we going to do?
Fake it? A good thing you didn't lose the fiddle or we would be sunk!

[Sharing the upper berth on an overnight train]
Get your foot out of my face! And don't crowd! Why don't you stay on your own side? Will you quit crowding?
Would you mind getting over further and don't crowd?
Did you know that you have my pants on your leg?
[Stan looks around, checks his pockets, smiles, and points to the train that just left the station]
